arguments.name: substring
arguments.description: the string to search in the list

arguments.name: delimiters
arguments.description: Characters that separate list elements. The default value is comma.

arguments.name: includeEmptyFields
arguments.description: if set to true, empty values are included as well

name: listcontains
description:
Determines the index of the first list element that contains a
        specified substring.
        Returns the index of the first list element that contains
        substring. If not found, returns zero.
